rawConfiguration.text:
Description
---
You can check dyno resources 1 by 1.

You can use UUID table as a filter. 

Click [...] > Click 'Edit' > Turn on 'Filter the current dashboard'

nrqlQueries.query: FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*load_avg_1m=(?P<loadAvg1m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'loadAvg1m' WHERE procid like 'web.%' AND app.name = 'heroku' and message like '%load_avg%' TIMESERIES FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') limit max) SELECT latest(loadAvg1m) TIMESERIES FACET UUID

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*load_avg_5m=(?P<loadAvg5m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'loadAvg5m' WHERE procid like 'web.%' AND app.name = 'heroku' and message like '%load_avg%' TIMESERIES FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') limit max) SELECT latest(loadAvg5m) TIMESERIES FACET UUID

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*load_avg_15m=(?P<loadAvg15m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'loadAvg15m' WHERE procid like 'web.%' AND app.name = 'heroku' and message like '%load_avg%' TIMESERIES FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') limit max) SELECT latest(loadAvg15m) TIMESERIES FACET UUID

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory_quota=(?P<memoryTotal>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Used' WHERE procid like 'web.%' AND app.name = 'heroku' and message like '%memory%' FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\.]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') as 'UUID', capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*') as 'id') SELECT latest(Used) as 'Memory Used (RAM + DiskCache)' FACET UUID, id as 'AppId'

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory_quota=(?P<memoryQuota>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'MB' WHERE procid = 'web.1' AND app.name = 'heroku' and message like '%memory%' FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<id>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') LIMIT MAX) SELECT latest(MB) as 'MB' FACET UUID

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory_rss=(?P<memoryRSS>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Used' WHERE procid = 'web.1' AND app.name = 'heroku' AND message like '%memory%' TIMESERIES FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') limit max) SELECT latest(Used) as 'Used' TIMESERIES FACET UUID

FROM(FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory_quota=(?P<memoryQuota>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) - latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory_rss=(?P<memoryRSS>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Free' WHERE procid = 'web.1' AND app.name = 'heroku' AND message like '%memory%' TIMESERIES FACET capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.(?P<appId>[^\\. ]+).*'), capture(message, '.*dyno=heroku\\.[^\\. ]+.(?P<UUID>[^\\. ]+).*') limit max) SELECT latest(Free) as 'Free' TIMESERIES FACET UUID
FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*tables=(?P<tables>\\d+).*'))) WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres'
FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*db_size=(?P<dbSize>\\d+).*'))) / 1e9 as '' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres'

FROM Log SELECT average(numeric(capture(message, '.*read-iops=(?P<readIOps>[\\d\\.]+).*')))*-1 as 'Read', average(numeric(capture(message, '.*write-iops=(?P<writeIOps>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Write' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes
FROM Log SELECT latest(numeric(capture(message, '.*wal-percentage-used=(?P<walPercentageUsed>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'WAL %' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes
FROM Log SELECT derivative(numeric(capture(message, '.*current_transaction=(?P<transaction>\\d+).*')), 1 minutes) limit 100 WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 10 minutes

FROM Log SELECT max(numeric(capture(message, '.*active-connections=(?P<activeConnections>\\d+).*'))) as 'Active', max(numeric(capture(message, '.*waiting-connections=(?P<waitingConnections>[\\d\\.]+).*')))*-1 as 'Waiting' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes

FROM Log SELECT average(numeric(capture(message, '.*index-cache-hit-rate=(?P<indexCacheHitRate>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Index', average(numeric(capture(message, '.*table-cache-hit-rate=(?P<tableCacheHitRate>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as 'Table' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes

FROM Log SELECT average(numeric(capture(message, '.*tmp-disk-used=(?P<tmpDiskUsed>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) / 1e9 as 'Used', average(numeric(capture(message, '.*tmp-disk-available=(?P<tmpDiskAvailable>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) / 1e9 as 'Available' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes

FROM Log SELECT average(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory-free=(?P<memoryFree>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) / 1e6 as 'Free', average(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory-cached=(?P<memoryCached>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) / 1e6 as 'Cached', average(numeric(capture(message, '.*memory-postgres=(?P<memoryPostgres>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) / 1e6 as 'Postgres' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes

FROM Log SELECT max(numeric(capture(message, '.*load-avg-1m=(?P<loadAvg1m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as '1 min',  max(numeric(capture(message, '.*load-avg-5m=(?P<loadAvg5m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as '5 min',  max(numeric(capture(message, '.*load-avg-15m=(?P<loadAvg15m>[\\d\\.]+).*'))) as '15 min' WHERE procid = 'heroku-postgres' TIMESERIES 5 minutes
